text: These haters pretending that it's all good. Say that sh-t in person man, I wish y'all would.
author: Drake

text: Holding her hand in public is just another way of saying you're proud to have her.
author: Drake

text: Just remember that when nobody was there for you, I was. And when nobody else gave a damn, I did.
author: Drake

text: She might say she love me, she don't love me like she say she love me.
author: Drake

text: I be getting high just to balance out the lows.
author: Drake

text: I tried to keep us together, you were busy keeping secrets.
author: Drake

text: Want to know a Secret? Someone out there can't stop thinking about you.You are Beautiful. Don't ever believe differently.
author: Drake

text: Always gone but never hard to find..
author: Drake

text: Boys will break your heart. Real men will pick up the pieces.
author: Drake

text: Hope you'll forgive me, never meant wrong. Tried to be patient, but waited too long. But I would've came back..
author: Drake

text: Live for today, plan for tomorrow, party tonight, party tonight.
author: Drake

text: Time heals all and heels hurt to walk in, but they go with the clutch that you carry your lip gloss in.
author: Drake

text: Patience is key for getting over a breakup. That, and trailing off your interaction after the breakup.
author: Drake

text: Sometimes it's the journey that teaches you a lot about your destination.
author: Drake

text: Sometimes you have to erase the messages, delete the numbers, and move on. You don't have to forget who that person was to you, but you do have to accept that they aren't that person anymore.
author: Drake

text: Grudges are a waste of perfect happiness. Laugh when you can. Apologize when you should and let go of what you can't change.
author: Drake

text: No matter how dirty your past is, your future is still spotless.
author: Drake

text: Want to know a secret? Someone out there can't stop thinking about you. You are beautiful. Don't ever believe differently.
author: Drake

text: Anytime you're afraid to try something new...just remember, amateurs built the ark, professionals built the titanic.
author: Drake

text: Faded way too long, I'm floatin in and out of consciousness
author: Drake

text: Every million I gain an enemy or a cousin. And people's feelings have changed ever since I became somethin.
author: Drake

text: I just hope that you miss me a little when I'm gone.
author: Drake

text: Nobody really likes us except for us.
author: Drake

text: He’s going to be sorry he lost you, so stop worrying. Forget the past, forget the pain and remember what an incredible woman you are.
author: Drake

text: Throw em a bone and they want a steak.
author: Drake

text: We don't relate (no) racks in the (rack) Racks in the safe (safe) Steak on my plate (steak)
author: Drake

text: When your ex says ‘You’ll never find anyone like me’. Say ‘that’s the point’.
author: Drake
